content: I have received the email for my team and meeting links. In terms of what to expect from the hackathon (and any additional information), is there a file or brochure somewhere that we can review?
There is no further information at this time. More details will be provided when the hackathon begins.
There seem to be no way to access the stream
@Michael Hansen @Josh Mandel @Carl Anderson Who's at Microsoft can answer support questions around the DevDays Hack? There's people with questions here, at the event listing and at the Organizer Q&A.
I'll ping the organizer. @Cory G Stevenson @Steve Ordahl
@Patricia Guerra Can you look into this? It seems there are people who have registered for the MS Hack but didn't get an email.
Lynisha is following up with people and us Rien. The emails did in fact go out, so it may have gone to spam
@Baris Bekdas @Michael Sauer Please reach out to Linishya Vaz in https://whova.com/portal/webapp/keyco_202001/CommunityBoard/topic/344923/ if you still have questions
